text:
Some metrics require the calculation of annual averages (e.g. ESRS S1 Disclosure Requirement S1-
6 – Characteristics of the undertaking’s employees). ESRS do not prescribe how to calculate annual
averages as long as the calculation method results in information that meets the qualitative
characteristics of information (ESRS 1 Chapter 2; see also ESRS 1 paragraph 89).
Supporting material
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2023/363 of 31 October 2022 states in Article 6:
